pr_title: Issue #1043 Allow the configuration of a IntervalBiFunction in Spring Boot2

timeline.message: Issue #1043 Allow the configuration of a IntervalBiFunction in Spring Boot2

timeline.bodyText: @RobWin Should I throw and exception when both RetryConfigurationProperties.InstanceProperties.waitDuration and RetryConfigurationProperties.InstanceProperties.intervalBiFunction are used or let RetryConfig.Builder.build to do the job?
timeline.author: cosminseceleanu
